Chance the Rapper: 5 Things You Didn’t Know About 2017 BET Humanitarian Award Winner

Chance the Rapper is taking the music industry by storm. In the first week of its May 2016 release, the 24-year-old Chicago native’s third mixtape, Coloring Book, was streamed a…
